thread.title: Sushmita Sen bewitched by Irrfan's acting skills
thread.title_full: Sushmita Sen bewitched by Irrfan's acting skills - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Sushmita Sen bewitched by Irrfan's acting skills
text:
"What brilliance" and "Bravo" are some of the words of appreciation used by actress Sushmita Sen to laud Irrfan Khan's acting prowess. The actress says she respects the team of “Talvar” for delving into the Aarushi Talwar murder case on the big screen.

Sushmita Sen and Irrfan 
“My respect to all the actors and team of #Talvar and a special mention of immense admiration for #IrfanKhan...What brilliance! Bravo,” Sushmita tweeted.
With “Talvar”, Meghna Gulzar has taken a plunge into telling three theories around the 2008 murder of 14-year-old Aarushi Talwar and her family's domestic servant Hemraj, on the big screen. It also stars Konkona Sen Sharma, and hit the screens on October 2.
